Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper23Asyn.name: AsyncProcessStepHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper23Asyn.abstract: Handler that allows some custom action to be performed for AsyncProcessStep,

Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper22Step.name: StepCompletionCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper22Step.abstract: Callback that should be invoked when the step’s run method is complete,

Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper18Proc.name: ProcessStepHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper18Proc.abstract: Handler that allows some custom action to be performed for ProcessStep,

Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper17Scri.name: ScriptStepHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:12SwiftScraper17Scri.abstract: Callback invoked when a ScriptStep or AsyncScriptStep is finished.

Protocols/Step.html.name: Step
Protocols/Step.html.abstract: Represents a step which is performed as part of the scraping pipeline flow.

Functions.html#/s:12SwiftScraper2eeoiySb.abstract: Checks equality of the runner state, including index of currently running step

Functions.html#/s:12SwiftScraper2neoiySb.abstract: Checks inequality of the runner state, including index of currently running step

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: parameterSerialization
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: Problem with serializing parameters to pass to the JavaScript.

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: contentUnexpected
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: An assertion failed, the page contents was not what was expected.

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: javascriptError(errorMessage:)
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: JavaScript error occurred when trying to process the page.

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: navigationFailed(errorMessage:)
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: Page navigation failed with the given error.

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: incorrectStep
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: The step which was specified could not be found to be run, e.g. if an incorrect index was specified for

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: timeout
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: Timeout occurred while waiting for a step to complete.

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: commonScriptNotFound
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: Something went wrong with loading the common script, which is included in the package

Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.name: scriptNotFound(name:)
Enums/SwiftScraperError.html#/s:12SwiftS.abstract: Something went wrong with loading the testing JavaScript file

Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.name: jumpToStep(_:)
Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.abstract: Jump to the step at the given index in the Step array and continue execution from there.

Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.name: finish
Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.abstract: StepRunnerState stops executing, and finishes immediately with a state of StepRunnerState.success.

Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.name: failure(_:)
Enums/StepFlowResult.html#/s:12SwiftScra.abstract: StepRunnerState stops executing, and finishes immediately with a state of StepRunnerState.failure.

Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.name: jumpToStep(_:_:)
Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: Jump to the step at the given index in the Step array and continue execution from there.

Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.name: finish(_:)
Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: StepRunnerState stops executing, and finishes immediately with a state of StepRunnerState.success.

Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.name: failure(_:_:)
Enums/StepCompletionResult.html#/s:12Swi.abstract: StepRunnerState stops executing, and finishes immediately with a state of StepRunnerState.failure.

Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.name: notStarted
Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.abstract: Not yet started, run() has not been called.

Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.name: inProgress(index:)
Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.abstract: The pipeline is running, and currently executing the step at the index.

Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.name: failure(error:)
Enums/StepRunnerState.html#/s:12SwiftScr.abstract: The execution failed with the given error.

Enums/StepRunnerState.html.name: StepRunnerState
Enums/StepRunnerState.html.abstract: Indicates the progress and status of the StepRunner.

Enums/StepCompletionResult.html.name: StepCompletionResult
Enums/StepCompletionResult.html.abstract: Result that indicates what to do next (i.e. control flow instruction)

Enums/StepFlowResult.html.name: StepFlowResult
Enums/StepFlowResult.html.abstract: Result which defines control flow of the steps.

Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.name: state
Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.abstract: The observable state which indicates the progress and status.

Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.name: stateObservers
Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.abstract: Callbacks which are called on each state change

Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.name: model
Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.abstract: A model dictionary which can be used to pass data from step to step.

Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.name: run(steps:completion:)
Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.abstract: Resets the existing StepRunner and execute the given steps in the existing browser.

Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.name: insertWebViewIntoView(parent:)
Classes/StepRunner.html#/s:12SwiftScrape.abstract: Insert the WebView used for scraping at index 0 of the given parent view, using AutoLayout to pin all 4 sides

Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.name: webView(_:didFinish:)
Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.abstract: Tells the delegate that navigation is complete.

Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.name: webView(_:didFailProvisionalNavigation:withError:)
Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.abstract: Tells the delegate that an error occurred during the early navigation process.

Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.name: webView(_:didFail:withError:)
Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.abstract: Tells the delegate that an error occurred during navigation.

Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.name: userContentController(_:didReceive:)
Classes/Browser.html#/c:@M@SwiftScraper@.abstract: Tells the handler that a webpage sent a script message.

Classes/Browser.html.name: Browser
Classes/Browser.html.abstract: The browser used to perform the web scraping.

Classes/StepRunner.html.name: StepRunner
Classes/StepRunner.html.abstract: The StepRunner is the engine that runs the steps in the pipeline.

Classes/AsyncProcessStep.html.name: AsyncProcessStep
Classes/AsyncProcessStep.html.abstract: Step that performs some async processing, can update the model dictionary,

Classes/AsyncScriptStep.html.name: AsyncScriptStep
Classes/AsyncScriptStep.html.abstract: Step that runs some script which will return a result asynchronously via SwiftScraper.postMessage().

Classes/PageChangeStep.html.name: PageChangeStep
Classes/PageChangeStep.html.abstract: Step that runs some script, which will result in a new page being loaded.

Classes/ProcessStep.html.name: ProcessStep
Classes/ProcessStep.html.abstract: Step that performs some processing, can update the model dictionary,

Classes/ScriptStep.html.name: ScriptStep
Classes/ScriptStep.html.abstract: Step that runs some JavaScript which will return a result immediately from the JavaScript function.

Classes/WaitForConditionStep.html.name: WaitForConditionStep
Classes/WaitForConditionStep.html.abstract: Step that waits for condition to become true before proceeding,

Classes/WaitStep.html.name: WaitStep
Classes/WaitStep.html.abstract: Step that waits for a fixed number of seconds.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
